Summary: rectangular craft w three lights on a straight path stopped, hovered, and disappeared
divs: sighting detailsrectangular craft w three lights on a straight path stopped, hovered, and disappeared i was driving to work early on sunday morning (9\30\12). i was headed down rt 33 east from hanover toward richmond. i first saw something strange in the sky near the farrington fire department. i noticed three white lights in a straight line flying very low over the tree line to the left of the road about a half mile away. it seemed strange to me because there is a tower in the area and it was flying very close to the bottom set of flashing lights on the tower. although it seemed strange, i dismissed it as being a helicopter. i thought maybe there had been an accident and they needed to land the med-evac helicopter or something. i paid it no further attention and continued on my drive. this must have happened about 6:10am. i continued east on rt 33. i passed by the junction for 295 and as i came to the stoplight, i noticed three white lights in a straight line coming from the left side of the road, moving faster than an airplane that was that close normally would. i am not very good at estimating distances, but if i had to guess, it looked like it was about where the martins grocery store was, no more than a half mile away. if i had to guess how high it was, i would say no more than a five story building. i would say it was about 3 times as big as i would expect an airplane to look at that distance. it was 6:15 to 6:20 at this point. i stopped at the stoplight. there was only one other car on the road with me; it was behind me. i continued to watch this thing, and it just seemed so strange because it began to slow down. as it slowed, i could see that the three lights were part of a dark rectangular object. imagine a rectangle, short and wide with 3 white lights evenly spaced along the top edge of the rectangle. i started to feel like i was looking at something really unusual, and that it was definitely not an airplane or a helicopter. the object came to a stop almost directly in front of me. when it stopped, the lights moved from being parallel to the ground to being at a 45 degree angle to the ground. the lights seemed brighter and the dark object was not visible anymore. at that point, the stoplight turned green. i was really scared. i didn't want to go towards this thing, but being the first car at the light, and having another car behind me, i couldn't just stop. i slowly began to cross the intersection. just as i cleared the intersection, the three lights went down to just a pinpoint of light and it just disappeared. it became one light and disappeared so quickly, it was like flipping a switch, it happened in a fraction of a second. my initial reaction was sheer terror, i knew i had seen something really unusual. i wanted to somehow stop the car behind me and confirm what just happened. i spent several years living outside of an air force base when my husband was in the military, so i am used to seeing all kinds of planes and helicopters up close, and this was not like anything i have ever seen before. all day long, i was filled with a sense of dread about going home in the dark that evening, fearing that i might see something else in the sky. it seemed so easy before to dismiss ufo sightings as simple misidentification of known objects, and i am really surprised at how seeing what i saw effected me emotionally. it scared me so much i was on the brink of tears even later that night when i told my husband about it. i am very interested in talking to anyone else who might have seen this too.
